dataList.dlg: With impeccable swiftness… I will render them silent.
The morning is always quiet. It’s also a surprisingly viable time for assassination due to the lack of passersby.
Is there anything you want to say? I can afford a moment to hear it.
The moonlight scatters… This is an opportune day for blending into the shade.
I’m always watching, Manager. Just call when you need something.
Give me my next target. I’ll make quick work of them.
Heathcliff has been irritating me lately… Though, I can’t deny that he brings serviceable results with him. This note? …It’s nothing to worry about.

Where I used to be… would things have gone differently if you were there with us?
Could that hell have been… somewhat bearable?

I favor the color red. A deeper hue bespeaks an unstopping hemorrhage and briskly arriving demise.
…Plus, it’s the color of your head, too.
Executive Manager…? Do you really think you can hide from me?
I’ll repay the favor with my performance, now that it’s more reliable and efficient.
An equal fate to all.
Is that my target? Should be easy.
You aren’t supposed to visit me in the middle of a mission…
Unseen by any.
I’ll render you silent next.
Ah!
Total silence.
Huff… You’d have been fine if you stayed hidden.
Wouldn’t even count as a low rank mission.
I’m sure I told you the likelihood of success for this mission…
A predetermined conclusion. What’s my next mission?
That was a smooth battle. I was able to see through all the enemy’s weaknesses.
Was I too fast for everyone else to follow?
